EmailTemplate.name: Application Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Deal Has Been Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Marble__c.OwnerFullName},
Good news! The business relationship team has submitted the application for {!Marble__c.Company_DBA__c} to at least one partner. Please check the marble to see who it has been sent to.
https://na33.salesforce.com/{!Marble__c.SFID__c}
Thanks!
